recipes.title: Pasta Aglio e Olio
recipes.description: A classic Roman pasta made with garlic, olive oil, and red pepper flakes. Simple yet deeply flavorful, this dish proves that great cooking does not need a long list of ingredients.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Tender chunks of marinated chicken simmered in a creamy tomato-based sauce with aromatic spices. A beloved dish that has become a staple in kitchens worldwide.

recipes.title: Tacos Al Pastor
recipes.description: Marinated pork cooked with pineapple and served in warm corn tortillas. Inspired by Lebanese shawarma, this dish is a perfect example of culinary fusion.

recipes.title: Miso Soup
recipes.description: A warm and comforting soup made with fermented soybean paste, tofu, and seaweed. It is a staple of Japanese home cooking served with nearly every meal.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with a creamy dressing made from anchovies, garlic, and parmesan. Invented in Tijuana, Mexico, despite its Italian-sounding name.

recipes.title: Pad Thai
recipes.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, and a tangy tamarind sauce. A street food favorite that balances sweet, sour, salty, and spicy in every bite.

recipes.title: Beef Bourguignon
recipes.description: A rich French stew of beef braised in red wine with carrots, onions, and mushrooms. Slow cooking transforms simple ingredients into something extraordinary.

recipes.title: Sushi Rolls
recipes.description: Vinegared rice and fresh fish wrapped in seaweed. Making sushi at home is a fun and rewarding process once you get the hang of rolling.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing mix of tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, red onion, and feta cheese dressed with olive oil and oregano. No lettuce needed in the traditional version.

recipes.title: Butter Chicken
recipes.description: Tender chicken pieces in a rich, buttery tomato cream sauce. Created in Delhi in the 1950s, it has become one of the most popular Indian dishes globally.

recipes.title: Fish and Chips
recipes.description: Battered and deep-fried fish served with thick-cut fries. A British classic best enjoyed with malt vinegar and mushy peas on the side.

recipes.title: Ramen
recipes.description: A deeply flavored broth served with wheat noodles, sliced pork, soft-boiled egg, and various toppings. Each region of Japan has its own signature style.

recipes.title: Falafel Wrap
recipes.description: Crispy fried chickpea patties tucked into pita bread with tahini sauce, pickles, and fresh vegetables. A satisfying and protein-packed meal.

recipes.title: Carbonara
recipes.description: Pasta coated in a silky sauce made from eggs, pecorino cheese, and guanciale. The key is tossing everything together off the heat so the eggs thicken without scrambling.

recipes.title: Bibimbap
recipes.description: A colorful rice bowl topped with sauteed vegetables, meat, a fried egg, and spicy gochujang sauce. Mix everything together before eating for the best experience.

recipes.title: Tom Yum Soup
recipes.description: A hot and sour Thai soup loaded with shrimp, mushrooms, lemongrass, and lime. The fragrant broth hits every taste bud and clears the sinuses.

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipes.description: Eggs poached in a spiced tomato and pepper sauce. Best served straight from the skillet with crusty bread for dipping into the runny yolks.

recipes.title: Pho
recipes.description: A fragrant beef or chicken broth ladled over rice noodles and fresh herbs. The broth is everything here, built from charred onions, ginger, and whole spices.

recipes.title: Paella
recipes.description: A saffron-infused rice dish cooked with seafood, chicken, and vegetables in a wide shallow pan. The crispy rice at the bottom, called socarrat, is the best part.

recipes.title: Dumplings
recipes.description: Thin dough wrappers filled with seasoned pork and vegetables, then steamed or pan-fried. Making them is a communal activity perfect for a weekend afternoon.

recipes.title: Ceviche
recipes.description: Fresh raw fish cured in citrus juices and mixed with onions, cilantro, and chili peppers. The acid from the lime effectively cooks the fish without heat.

recipes.title: Bangers and Mash
recipes.description: Pork sausages served over creamy mashed potatoes with onion gravy. A hearty pub classic that is the definition of comfort food.

recipes.title: Enchiladas
recipes.description: Corn tortillas rolled around a filling and covered in chili sauce and cheese. They come out of the oven bubbling and irresistible.

recipes.title: Laksa
recipes.description: A spicy coconut curry soup with noodles, shrimp, and fresh herbs. The rich broth gets its complexity from a paste made with over a dozen ingredients.

recipes.title: Moussaka
recipes.description: Layers of eggplant, spiced meat sauce, and creamy bechamel baked until golden. Think of it as the Greek answer to lasagna.
